# Forecasting {#forecast}

## The fable object

```{r forecast, eval = FALSE}
UKLungDeaths %>% 
  ETS(mdeaths) %>% 
  forecast()
```

```{r forecast-display, echo = FALSE}
ets_fc <- ets_fit %>% 
  forecast()
ets_fc
ets_fc %>% 
  autoplot()
```


* Index
* Mean (backtransformed and bias adjusted)
* Standard error (may not be needed)
* Distribution
